name: cosselrels

-| wi(wcel(ccoss(c0), universe), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels))

comment: Cosets of sets are elements of the relations class. Implies ` |- ( R e. Rels -> ,~ R e. Rels ) ` . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Aug-2021.)
